snippets.title: While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that runs as long as its condition remains true.

snippets.title: While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that runs as long as its condition remains true.

snippets.title: While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that runs as long as its condition remains true.
snippets.code: int i=0;while(i<5){    std::cout << i << std::endl;    i++;}

snippets.title: While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that runs as long as its condition remains true.
snippets.code:
i=1
 while i<=5 do
    print(i)
    i=i+1
end

snippets.title: If Statement
snippets.description: A conditional branch that runs code only when a condition is true.

snippets.title: If Statement
snippets.description: A conditional branch that runs code only when a condition is true.

snippets.title: If Statement
snippets.description: A conditional branch that runs code only when a condition is true.

snippets.title: If Statement
snippets.description: A conditional branch that runs code only when a condition is true.
snippets.code:
if true then
    print('true')
else
    print('false')
end

snippets.title: Do While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that executes once before checking its condition.

snippets.title: Do While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that executes once before checking its condition.
snippets.code:
# Python has no do-while, emulate with while True
i = 0
while True:
    print(i)
    i += 1
    if i >= 5:
        break

snippets.title: Do While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that executes once before checking its condition.
snippets.code: int i=0;do{    std::cout << i << std::endl;    i++;}while(i<5);

snippets.title: Do While Loop
snippets.description: A loop that executes once before checking its condition.
snippets.code:
i=1
repeat
    print(i)
    i=i+1
until i>5

snippets.title: Switch/Match
snippets.description: A multi-branch conditional that selects code based on a matched value.
snippets.code: switch(day){    case 1: console.log('Mon'); break;    case 2: console.log('Tue'); break;    default: console.log('Other');}

snippets.title: Switch/Match
snippets.description: A multi-branch conditional that selects code based on a matched value.
snippets.code:
# Python 3.10+ uses match
match day:
    case 1: print('Mon')
    case 2: print('Tue')
    case _: print('Other')

snippets.title: Switch/Match
snippets.description: A multi-branch conditional that selects code based on a matched value.
snippets.code: switch(day){    case 1: std::cout << "Mon"; break;    case 2: std::cout << "Tue"; break;    default: std::cout << "Other";}

snippets.title: Switch/Match
snippets.description: A multi-branch conditional that selects code based on a matched value.
snippets.code:
-- Lua has no native switch, use if/elseif
if day==1 then
 print('Mon')
elseif day==2 then
 print('Tue')
else
 print('Other')
 end

snippets.title: Error Handling
snippets.description: Error-handling structure for catching exceptions and running cleanup code.
snippets.code: try {    risky();} catch(e) {    console.error(e);} finally {    cleanup();}

snippets.title: Error Handling
snippets.description: Error-handling structure for catching exceptions and running cleanup code.

snippets.title: Error Handling
snippets.description: Error-handling structure for catching exceptions and running cleanup code.

snippets.title: Error Handling
snippets.description: Error-handling structure for catching exceptions and running cleanup code.
snippets.code:
local ok, err = pcall(risky)
if not ok then
 print(err)
 end

snippets.title: Async/Await
snippets.description: Syntax for writing asynchronous code in a readable, sequential style.
snippets.code: async function fetchData(){    const data = await getData();    console.log(data);}
